title: [Dynamic Regions] multiple rocksdb tikv panic for txn record found but not expected

comments_data.body: It did not repro so far. Removing the critical and adding major.

It's likely fixed by https://github.com/tikv/raft-engine/pull/314 
And it's not reproed after the fix.
Not repro-ed in recent Jepsen tests. Close it for now as it's likely fixed by recent merge fix

this issue is still exist in master 

The panicking region 1199 has not been merged before. cc @tonyxuqqi
